name: Where?
description: Where you want to search? Be more specific if you seem to get the wrong location. You will only get the prices if you search within the USA (other countries are not supported with this feature on Google mapsa yet).

name: How many places?
description: The maximum number of places you want to find. The scrape is limited by what Google Maps shows, i.e. anything between 1 and 400 places.
